synopsis.p: Projects OBO terms and synonyms on sections.

description.p: reads source SKOS terminologies or OWL ontologies and searches for class and concept labels in sections.

The parameters allowJoined, allUpperCaseInsensitive, caseInsensitive, ignoreDiacritics, joinDash, matchStartCaseInsensitive, skipConsecutiveWhitespaces, skipWhitespace and wordStartCaseInsensitive control the matching between the section and the entry keys.

creates an annotation for each matched entry and adds these annotations to the layer named targetLayerName. The created annotations will have the feature uriFeature containing the URI of the matched class or concept. may also map property object values into features specified by labelFeatures.

param-doc.name: source
param-doc.p: Path to the source SKOS/OWL files.

param-doc.name: labelFeatures
param-doc.p: Mapping from feature names to property URIs. This parameter indicates the properties of the entry to record in features.

param-doc.name: labelURIs
param-doc.p: RDF properties whose object values that represent entry keys.

param-doc.name: resourceTypeURIs
param-doc.p: Type of RDF resources that represent an entry.

param-doc.name: uriFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the entry URI.

param-doc.name: prefixes
param-doc.p: Specify URI prefixes to be used in resourceTypeURIs, labelURIs, and labelFeatures

param-doc.name: rdfFormat
param-doc.p: Specify the RDF serialization format (xml, rdfxml, xmlrdf, turtle, ttl, n3, ntriples, ntriple, nt, jsonld, rdfjson, jsonrdf, json, trig, nquads, nq, nthrift, csv, tsv, trix).

param-doc.name: language
param-doc.p: Specify the language of labels to project. If this parameter is not set then labels of any language are projected. Labels without a language qualifier are always projected regardless of the value of this parameter.
